name: Rewound
description:
REWOUND

Stop the end of the universe with the power of time travel!

Use WASD to move around, mouse to drag / interact with objects within range.

You may try to figure out what each item does, or read explanation below if you feel stuck:

  • Computer - it's telling you to input some kind of code there... doc's sure he wrote the code somewhere in the lab. Input the code using number keys.
  • Key - drag to door to open it. One use only (but you can move the broken key if you want).
  • Cement - drop into water to create land.
  • Clock - rewind time! All the items return to their original positions, except for...
  • Time Bubble - A crystal emitting a strange aura. Anything touching the time bubble will stay in place when rewinding time.

Made for Trijam, almost in 3 hours.... Or well, maybe in 8-ish. Maybe next time I'll scope the project accordingly. The theme for the jam was "One enemy only", and what could be more cruel enemy than time itself?

Music and sfx by Mubsi.

Premade assets:

  • Custom template project with menu in place
  • Font: Rainy Hearts from Dafont by Camellina
